= entry point =
* The function from where the execution of the thread starts. 
* main thread starts the execution from main function.

= random points =
* From user point of view every function has to be visualized as multiple statements within the 
	curly braces. But from system point of view every function has to be visualized as instructions 
	present in text segment.
* When function is invoked cpu is executing the instructions present in text segment.
